{{Lang|'''Wanyu'''|zh=琬玉|zh_rm=Wǎnyù}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in {{Quest|No Mere Stone}}. She is the Head of Human Culture and Civilization Research at [[Shenglu Hall]].

===Appearance===
Wanyu has a sophisticated and scholarly appearance. She wears a dark red, knee-length dress adorned with intricate golden patterns, resembling traditional Chinese clothing. The dress features short sleeves and a high collar, fastened with ornate clasps. She accessorizes with gold bracelets on both wrists and wears black tights paired with black shoes. Her hair is styled in a neat bun, and she wears rectangle glasses that add to her intellectual demeanor.
